name: The Shifting House
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights that you can toggle in the settings menu!

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jame Gam #6 and Mini Jam 95: Chance

Themes: "Chance" and "Out of time"

Limitation: "No RNG"

Special Object: "Key"

How it all fits together?

You have found yourself in the Haunted Chance Estate on a rainy night. You must get rid of all the ghosts to get the key to leave before the fuel in your lantern runs out. Whenever lightning strikes, the inside of the mansion might change and you must take this chance to progress the level. (I understand that this might seem like a stretch but how am I suppose to make a chance of something happening with no RNG?)          

If the browser audio seems like it is broken, download the game for a better audio experience.
